Description: Hanaato -shirushi-  (花痕 -shirushi-, Flower Tracks -Signs-) is the ending theme song for the Suruga Devil story featured in the Hanamonogatari anime series.

#Background.text: It was written by Saori Kodama, composed by Kurosu Katsuhiko, arranged by Hideyuki Daichi Suzuki and performed by Marina Kawano.[1]
